title: Who should I main?

replies.body:
Never play any of those 4 champs, if you want people to like you

If you want people to hate you
- Teemo is in a decent spot right now
- Garen is always good, Uber tank with high dmg output
- Raka is easy, literally 0 brain cells required
- Donger is ok, but he is currently useless in a teamfight comp, better off for splitting with him
